name: Remove Tab Gradients - Dark-Theme-Friendly Edition
description: This theme removes tab and toolbar gradients. This edition of the theme handles active and hovered tabs differently than the original, instead highlighting a hovered-over tab, and a blue halo around the active tab.
additional_info:
A theme created by iJunkie22 - @iJunkie22 on Twitter
